properties.Observatio: A 30m long concrete trough  constructed at the beginning of the canal has broken. At one point in the middle of the canal, the right bank has collapsed for about 60m long section. The filling of the canal with sand has become a major problem for farmers
properties.Descriptio:
Replacing the broken Column with a 0.9 m x 0.45 m x 3.0 m Column

Demolition of damaged RC column incl. disposal

Temporary propping/shoring of trough

Saw-cut/chip interfaces and clean reinforcement/concrete

Drilling for starter bars/dowels (20 mm) inc

properties.Observatio: The canal spills constructed at several locations along the canal are dilapidated and need to be repaired.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of  40 m long 1.5 m total height two  Concrete Retaining walls

Construction of 1.5m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall 

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10 %

properties.Name_of_th: Canal from Co-op shop to Kinnarakadura
properties.Observatio: The filling of the canal with sand has become a major problem for farmers due to rainwater flowing upstream into the canal. For this reason, structures ( Sand trap) need to be built. Command area 50.0 acres
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of  50 m long 1.5 m total height two  Concrete Retaining walls

Construction of 1.5m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall 

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10 %

Canal Earthwork and Tree Planting

Stream / canal  reservation protect
